movies.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
movies.plot: Joel Barish, heartbroken that his girlfriend underwent a procedure to erase him from her memory, decides to do the same. However, as he watches his memories of her fade away, he realises that he still loves her, and may be too late to correct his mistake.

events.title: Joel and Clementine go to dinner at Klangs
Joel finds out that Clementine has had her memories of him erased
Joel has his memories of Clementine erased
Joel skips work for the day
Joel and Clementine revisit the frozen Charles river
Joel and Clementine realise they have erased each other from their memories
